data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word الْيَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: sign, apparent sign, mark, indication, message, evidence, proof, miracle, communication, verse of The Quran. It properly signifies any apparent thing inseparable from a thing not equally apparent so that when one perceives the former, he perceives the other which he cannot perceive by itself.
data.sentence: The word أَيُّهَا comes from the root ا ي ي and is associated with the meanings: sign, apparent sign, mark, indication, message, evidence, proof, miracle, communication, verse of The Quran. It properly signifies any apparent thing inseparable from a thing not equally apparent so that when one perceives the former, he perceives the other which he cannot perceive by itself.
The word الْمُجْرِمُونَ comes from the root ج ر م and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To set apart or away or aside a thing, remove or seperate a thing, to sever, distinguish/discriminate/discern/distinct, burst asunder, withdraw from a thing, to shift or quit.
data.sentence: The word وَامْتَازُوا comes from the root م ي ز and is associated with the meanings: To set apart or away or aside a thing, remove or seperate a thing, to sever, distinguish/discriminate/discern/distinct, burst asunder, withdraw from a thing, to shift or quit.
